Hello,

The customer confirms that the device has not been opened or repaired by a third party, exposed to water or suffered damage from impact or fall.

Hello ALICIA: You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is comfortable for you to send your package. You can find a list of delivery points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do Return preparation: 1. Check the instructions on how to return a product here 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your article 3. Remove any protective case or screen protector 4. Package your article and its accessories following these guidelines... The packaging of the article: • The box must be strong and resistant. You should place your article safely inside the box so it won't move during transit. • Attach the return label to the top of the box (you can also add an additional label on the inside to help identify your shipment if the original label peels off or gets damaged). • Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case your article is damaged during transportation. Your return is ready for shipping! We'll notify you when it arrives. Best regards, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

The refund request has been processed.

Regards,
TB
